stories.Title: The electric vehicle market has a new contestant
stories.Description: With the announcement of the ID.7, Volkswagen is planning to take Tesla's reign, offering a competitor for the acclaimed Model 3.

stories.Title: Elon Musk’s TruthGPT, a more reliable chatbot

stories.Title: Warning: That viral song might be fake
stories.Description: TikTok is flooded with The Weeknd and Drake's "collaboration" but the entire track was actually produced using DeepFake AI.

stories.Title: Take a look at ESA's JUICE farewell photo
stories.Description: The spacecraft shared a series of breathtaking images of its home planet just hours after embarking on its eight-year journey to Jupiter.

stories.Title: The metaverse is no longer Meta’s priority
stories.Description: It has been revealed that due to the company's ongoing cost-cutting efforts, Reels and AI tools are being prioritized over the metaverse.

stories.Title: Microsoft's plans to take the lead in the AI race
stories.Description: Reportedly, the company is working to develop its own AI chips to train large language models, as it aims to reduce its costly dependence on Nvidia.
stories.Tweet: Microsoft's plans to take the lead in the AI race 📦 Reportedly, the company is working to develop its own AI chips to train large language models, as it aims to reduce its costly dependence on Nvidia. #microsoft https://www.theverge.com/2023/4/18/23687912/microsoft-athena-ai-chips-nvidia

stories.Title: Apple's new financial move
stories.Description: Through partner Goldman Sachs, this latest service allows Apple Card credit card owners to open a high-yield savings account with the company.

stories.Title: Aliens? Portals? No, keep guessing
stories.Description: In Alaska, a photographer who was trying to capture the beauty of the northern lights was surprised by a spiral phenomenon. It turned out to be the Falcon 9 venting its unused fuel.
stories.Tweet: Aliens? Portals? No, keep guessing 📦 In Alaska, a photographer who was trying to capture the beauty of the northern lights was surprised by a spiral phenomenon. It turned out to be the Falcon 9 venting its unused fuel. #spacex https://petapixel.com/2023/04/17/giant-spiral-appears-amid-the-aurora-lights-in-alaskas-night-sky/

stories.Title: Mac users are facing a new threat
stories.Description: Security researchers are concerned about a recently discovered type of malware that targets macOS for the first time.
